page.title: 12Children's leisure.
page.content: In Chilton where we live we are really very lucky because our village is surrounded by countryside - fields and woods. We can play hide and seek down in the woods, make camps or climb trees. There is a beck in which we can plodge and make swings over the water. Sometimes we get thrown in! When the weather is fine we can play on the swings and roundabouts in the recreation grounds or ride our B.M.X. bikes on the new track that has just been completed near to the council football pitch. Some children play on their roller boots or their skate- boards. If it is raining we have to go in the house and read books or comics, watch television or videos or if we are lucky we may have a computer.
